text: Oliver Berg (born 28 August 1993) is a Norwegian footballer who plays for GIF Sundsvall in Superettan. ==References== Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Norwegian footballers Category:Raufoss IL players Category:Odds BK players Category:Dalkurd FF players Category:GIF Sundsvall players Category:Eliteserien players Category:Allsvenskan players Category:Sportspeople from Gjøvik Category:Association football midfielders
title: Oliver Berg
